Question
========

Which of the following vector types is **NOT** listed as one of the six ways to subset a vector described in [Section 4.2.1](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/subsetting.html#atomic-vectors-1) of *Advanced R*?

Answerlist
----------

* `integer`
* `character`
* `logical`
* `POSIXct`

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* No, `integer` is one way to subset a vector
* No, `character` is one way to subset a vector
* No, `logical` is one way to subset a vector
* Correct, `POSIXct` is not listed as a way to subset a vector
